sources.title: The Way of the West (1934)
sources.description: Government agent Gordon, working undercover, is investigating a cattleman sheepman war. The Culprit is Horton and when Horton kills Parker he frames Gordon. His identity revealed, the Sheriff lets Gordon escape to go after the real killer. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-way-of-the-west-1934/

sources.title: Way of the West
sources.description: You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: The Way of the West (1934) WALLY WALES
sources.description:
Stars: Wally Wales, Bobby Nelson, Myrla Bratton
Director: Robert Emmett Tansey

An undercover agent investigates a cattleman-sheepman feud.

metadata.Plot: Government agent Gordon, working undercover, is investigating a cattleman sheepman war. The Culprit is Horton and when Horton kills Parker he frames Gordon. His identity revealed, the Sheriff lets Gordon escape to go after the real killer.
metadata.Actors: Hal Taliaferro, Bobby Nelson, Myrla Bratton
